p: A large number of chemicals and compounds extracted from different higher plants is responsible for many pharmacological effects [81], [82], [83] such as antiviral, antibacterial, antifungal, anti-inflammatory, antioxidant, antipyretic antiseptic, antibiotic, analgesic, antitumor, anticancer, antiallergic, antiatherogenic, antimutagenic, and antinociceptive activities.
